nodes.text: Orange Harvest was a code name for a Disney Parks Star Wars project hinted at during Disney's D23 Expo in August of 2013. The name is a reference to Blue Harvest, the fictitious film title used for the production of Return of the Jedi to ensure the film's secrecy. While the slogan for Blue Harvest was "Horror Beyond Imagination," the Orange Harvest logo includes "Speculation Beyond Imagination."
The hints came in the form of a collection of wooden crates with various labels and references to Star Wars, along with the Orange Harvest logo, including:
